unnormalised: Hey, did anyone catch Dr. Sharma's talk on genetic predispositions to diabetes? She mentioned a study at AIIMS showing a strong correlation with the ABCC8 gene in North Indians. Apparently, 23% of participants with the gene developed type 2 diabetes before age 40. I'm def gonna get my family history checked now!
normalised: Hey, did anyone catch Doctor Sharma's talk on genetic predispositions to diabetes? She mentioned a study at A-I-I-M-S showing a strong correlation with the A-B-C-C-eight gene in North Indians. Apparently, twenty three percent of participants with the gene developed type two diabetes before age forty. I'm definitely going to get my family history checked now!
